title: RedSkyBox
example:
var tScene3D;
    tScene3D = RedScene()
    tScene3D.skyBox = RedSkyBox(RedGL Instance, [
        'asset/cubemap/posx.png',
        'asset/cubemap/negx.png',
        'asset/cubemap/posy.png',
        'asset/cubemap/negy.png',
        'asset/cubemap/posz.png',
        'asset/cubemap/negz.png'
    ])
